product_name: Garmin Edge 1000 GPS Bundle Bike Computer
long_description: Bundled with speed, cadence and heart-rate sensors to enhance training, Garmin Edge 1000 GPS Bike Computer lets you compete against others in real time, compare past rides and connect to online media.
short_description: Bundled with speed, cadence and heart-rate sensors to enhance training, Garmin Edge 1000 GPS Bike Computer lets you compete against others in real time, compare past rides and connect to online media.
